reporter-output.line: Test Scenario 2 : Checkout As Guest
Time and Date of Test Execution2018-10-29 19:12:17
Step 1 : Open URL is: https://promed-dev-scripco-refapp.accorin.us/
To Verify that Home Page is Displayed
Step :2 Open the Application
Welcome Msg is Displayed ====>: WELCOME TO OUR NEW SITE
✔ PASS
===>Home page is opened and Logo is Matched</br>
Step :3 Mouse Over to Mobility in Home Page
Step :4 Click on Geri_Chairs under Mobility
Step :5 Click on Add to Cart Button
Step :6 Click on My Cart Option
Verify that the Product which has been Selected is showing under My Cart Option
Item Selected in the Page Matches Item in the Cart : Double Sided Security Bed Rails 18"X20"
Converting String to Int of Original Price : 132.28
=========>Converting Double to Integer<=======
Item Selected in the Page : Double Sided Security Bed Rails 18"X20"
Converting String to Int of Original Price : 132.28
Comparing the two Items
Item Selected and Item in My Cart Matches
✔ PASS
Price Comparing
Item Selected and Item in My Cart Price Matches
✔ PASS
===>Product and Price Verified in My Cart</br>
Item Quantity Verified
Total Quantity of Product is Displayed : 1
✔ PASS
===>Product Item is Same as Selected</br>
Step :7 Click on CheckOut Option under My Cart
Filling the Shipping Information of the Customer
Step :8 Type the Shipping Address where the Customer want to Send his Order
Enter Email Id of Customer====>: prashantp+2778373@accorin.com</br>
Enter First Name of Customer====>: aa521test</br>
Enter Last Name of Customer====>: aa521test</br>
Enter Company Name====>: aa521testCompany</br>
Enter Street Address====>: 360 Vetarans Parkway, Suite 115</br>
Enter City name====>:Bolingbrook</br>
Select the State from the Drop Down :==> Illinois </br></br>
Enter the Pin Code of the State: 60440</br>
Select the Country from the Drop Down :==> United States </br></br>
Step :9 Address_Validation_PopUp
Enter the Phone Number of Customer: 123456789</br>
Address Validation PopUp
Clicked on : candidate_0
Address Pop Up Is Displayed
Click on Address Validation Pop Up Window</br></br>
Step :10 Select Shipping Customer
Click on Ground Standard under Choose a Shipping Option</br></br>
After Filling all the detail Click on Next Button</br></br>
Step :11 Go to Payment mode and Click on Credit Card radio button
Filling the Credit Card Details of the Customer
Step :12 Fill the Credit Card Details and Click on Place Order
Enter Credit Card Number===>4444333322221111</br>
Enter the Expiry Date===>04 / 2020</br>
Enter the Cvv Number===>123</br>
Verify that Order has been Confirmed and A message has been Displayed
Confirmation Message is Displayed :YOUR ORDER HAS BEEN PLACED
✔ PASS
Email Confirmation has Been Sent :An email confirmation is on its way to prashantp+2778373@accorin.com
✔ PASS
Order Number is Displayed :Order #4000001313
✔ PASS
===>Item is Placed and Shown in the Place</br>
